entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
